name: api-hooks
description: Rocketmakers front-end library for parsing a generated Typescript API client into a set of configurable React hooks for fetching and mutating data.

scripts.postinstall: (cd module && npm i) && (cd playground && npm i) && npm run link-api-hooks
scripts.link-api-hooks: (cd module && npm run build && npm run link) && (cd playground && npm run link-api-hooks)
scripts.upgrade-all: ncu -u && (cd module && ncu -u) && (cd playground && ncu -u) && npm i

author: developers@rocketmakers.com
